content.raw: I also get weird behavior when I try snapping together links that are connected by a joint. They don't snap together, then it looks like I lose the ability to select or snap links. Hmm... If I close and re-open the model editor (with CTRL-M or save and exit) it gets better and I can select and snap together link, including ones that are connected by a joint. Will this get fixed with the JointMaker makeover?
content.html: I also get weird behavior when I try snapping together links that are connected by a joint. They don't snap together, then it looks like I lose the ability to select or snap links.
